data.message:
Dear Stans getting excited that Marshall made this post .... 

He didn't sadly . More than likely it's his manager Paul Rosenberg or a member of the Shady team .

replies.message: It doesn't matter who wrote the post. You think Paul would give a shout out that Em himself didn't endorse?
Dennella Shebach  Exactly. To be honest, they're a team.

Dennella Shebach  he prolly told him wat to say smart ass . It's a well known fact Marshall doesn't post shit himself bc he don't know how to use the computer. He even said it in. A interview with no sarcasm he said his kids were trying to teach him .. do your research before u open your mouth and kindly fuck off 😘
State the obvious Kailie Marie. You just reiterated what I said. We're you born yesterday? Now you fuck off kiddo
